EmailTemplate.name: 16MayWeb-Social-Media.Thank You Feb21
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending - Resources from our Social Media Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
Thank you for attending our “How Solopreneurs Can Achieve ROI from Social Media" webinar held on Thursday, May 16. Jennifer Abernethy, best-selling author and founder of Socially Delivered™ & The Sales Lounge ®, explained how consultants could convert time spent on social media into postive returns for their business. Below you will find links to the material created for the webinar. Remember: the slides are copywritten material, so please do not repost or repurpose in any way. Recorded webinar <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinar-how-solopreneurs-can-achieve-roi-social-media-marketing> Webinar slide deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO-Social-Media-Webinar_5.16.13.pdf> Featured speaker Jennifer Abernethy website <http://www.sociallydelivered.com/>
